    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "match": {
            "message": "GET /search"
        }
    },
    collapse={
        "field": "user.id",
        "inner_hits": {
            "name": "most_recent",
            "size": 5,
            "sort": [
                {
                    "@timestamp": "desc"
                }
            ]
        },
        "max_concurrent_group_searches": 4
    },
